body: So I am assuming you are trying to do a grid-based analysis to get illuminance value during a certain hour, right? After taking a quick look at your file, I believe there is something that would help. 1.)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Nzsxa*Wuim9e1XP6Q8A0eHf6Kt6H0vKnaUTg7g9KL5Apu*Wg88jB7WF5EPR4Mf8LICFg05VN5-63J3NrXlqOXRsV*GkAixUD/14.JPG)disconnect the fly to the ladybug_ladybug component. 2.) specify the grid size in gentestpts component. 3.)Grasshopper is default to run in meters, make sure your rhino is also in meters.
